Articles.Content:
The KE-292 was first developed near the end of the second Kerbin war, it was the first functional jet propelled aircraft. It was faster then most fighters at the time But due to a lack of resources and factories being bomb to rubble, production had to cease. Only about 100 were produced.

*Okay so this is my first post of a aircraft of mine so I don't really know what I'm doing.* [*https://www.dropbox.com/s/cjg8vsqpeydnrbe/KE-292.craft?dl=0*](https://www.dropbox.com/s/cjg8vsqpeydnrbe/KE-292.craft?dl=0)

*(very simple aircraft) (warning aircraft likes to tip back on first spawn)*

![a2WKL2V.jpg?2](http://i.imgur.com/a2WKL2V.jpg?2)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T03:30:35Z" title="04/28/2015 03:30  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by Pirate\_Commander**
  
Added picture and download

The point of the spacecraft exchange is to show your crafts and offer them up for download. Just giving a description of the craft helps no-one and just clutters up the forums. Try to get a download link and at least 1 picture up here. However, I have noticed that jets tend to not get many comments.
I couldn'tget the pic to come up so I was waiting for it to show up first

I couldn't get the pic to come up so I was waiting for it to show up first

(oops)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T03:05:03Z" title="04/28/2015 03:05  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by Pirate\_Commander**
  
oops it did twice

Upload load to imgur, then use the buttons you can see at the top to post the pictures. Takes about 20s to learn which button. Please, before posting, use google to figure out how to post pictures. It makes it easier for you and everyone else.

As for download links, just use dropbox.
Thank you your a great help I would do that for now on.
No worries, glad to help. Reading over that it I realize I sounded like a bit of a ...., sorry.
Another helpful hint: I use pomf.se for all my image hosting and download hosting. It's fast, free, and kawaii.
